description:
Fixed the sweep at the end adding the Hammer ons and Pull offs.
Removed the let rings as i agree, they aren't needed.
Fixed many off the chord problems changing the chords in certain sections to single notes and vice versa.
Also fixed palm muting the pre chorus
Fixed spelling errors such as Rhythm and Purdy.
Fixed all the 16th and 32nd note problems in the verse.
The pinch harmonic is played on the E (C) string, watch the video closely.
This should be all of the tabs problems fixed.
Oh and i also fixed the bass slide in the intro.
title: Faithless
